overview: Iris is a product management executive and 2X entrepreneur. She is co-founder and VP Product at Takipi, a new start-up leveraging Big Data technology to change how developers debug software and manage downtime in the cloud. Previously, Iris was co-founder and VP Product at VisualTao, a Sequoia backed start-up which was acquired by Autodesk in 2009. Following the acquisition, Iris served as the product line manager for Autodeskâ€™s flagship web and mobile product line - bringing it from zero to 10M users in less than two years. Iris holds a B.Arch from Bezalel Academy of Art and design in Jerusalem.
